blog.name: peterpooperscooper
blog.title: Spider Son
blog.description: i am ready to be hurt again

summary: Now that I’ve seen Endgame again, I realized that Tony had the perfect death. Don’t get me wrong, I still cry when I think about...
body:
Now that I’ve seen Endgame again, I realized that Tony had the perfect death. Don’t get me wrong, I still cry when I think about it and I honestly think it was unfair for him to die, but Pepper was right. He can finally rest now.

For the five years after the snap, Tony continued to work. He never truly rested in those years. Yes, he did finally get married and he did have Morgan, but he never stopped working. He continued to upgrade his armor and he even made a suit for Pepper. He knew that Thanos was dead, but he couldn’t stop because he knew he had to protect his family. There will always be another threat. There is no way Tony could “retire” from being Iron Man, because as long as there was someone or something out there threatening to destroy the peace he had found with his family, he would be sure to protect his loved ones.

Tony died in the best way possible: protecting his loved ones. His final action was snapping Thanos and every one of his followers out of existence, ensuring that they would never attack earth again. That’s why i think Pepper’s line “You can rest now.” is so beautiful. She recognized that he had fulfilled his destiny in saving the universe. He protected his family. He can finally rest.

There will always be another threat. There is no way Tony could “retire” from being Iron Man, because as long as there was someone or something out there threatening to destroy the peace he had found with his family, he would be sure to protect his loved ones.

Tony died in the best way possible: protecting his loved ones. His final action was snapping Thanos and every one of his followers out of existence, ensuring that they would never attack earth again. #2 - Memories to Share

#3 -

title: An Iron Apprentice
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2V2ZTZQ

by witchiepoo

*endgame spoiler alerts everywhere here.*

You started off as Tony Stark’s smartest intern and ended up being his right hand man. A relationship between the two of you had started to form, platonic at first, then budded into something more than the two of you could deny. When Tony and the team fail and return from fighting Thanos (Infinity War), Tony reels his losses and decides to dismiss you and fire you so that you cannot become collateral damage. Upset and heartbroken, you find yourself back at the Avenger’s headquarter spending 5 years with Romanov trying to fix damages done and, ultimately, you find yourself back in the sidelines for another war. One that will inevitably end, but does it really end with Tony dying? Will the two of you become anything of what you could be? Or will you find a love somewhere else?

Words: 1807, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Reader, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Scott Lang, Bruce Banner, Peter Parker, You, Stephen Strange, Nebula (Marvel), Thanos (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Morgan Stark, Nick Fury, Carol Danvers
  • Relationships: Tony Stark & You (Iron Man movies), Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Tony Stark/Reader, Bruce Banner/Reader, Natasha Romanov/You (Iron Man movies), Steve Rogers & Reader, Steve Rogers/Reader
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie), Pre-Avengers: Endgame (Movie), Not Really Character Death, Spoilers, Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Not Beta Read, all ships not yet known


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2V2ZTZQ

*endgame spoiler alerts everywhere here.*

You started off as Tony Stark’s smartest intern and ended up being his right hand man. A relationship between the two of you had started to form, platonic at first, then budded into something more than the two of you could deny. Upset and heartbroken, you find yourself back at the Avenger’s headquarter spending 5 years with Romanov trying to fix damages done and, ultimately, you find yourself back in the sidelines for another war. blog.title: Lazily Mystical Zombie
blog.description: 25yo girl, fangirl, history freak and gamer.

title: Memories to Share
body:
Daily Writing Challenge by @sdavid09  -  Bonus Prompt #2:

Prompt:
Spring has finally sprung where I live, and the first thing I do is spend a day outside enjoying the beautiful weather. What is something your character does when Spring has finally sprung? 

Pairing: Tony Stark/reader

Author notes: Tony being kinda jealous of Bucky and the three last lines come from a bigger Universe I’m kinda working on. I might even write it down one day xd

MASTERLIST

_________________________________________

Memories to Share

The Spring was finally here.

The sky took on a beautiful azure shade and the sun shone brightly on flowers that blossomed throughout the night, unnoticed. The last bits of ice, that stubbornly stuck to the river since early December, finally melted and washed away, freeing the crystal-clear water.

And the cherry trees, oh the cherry trees! Delicate, pink petals covered the whole branches, swinging in the wind and promising sweet treats that would await the lucky ones in the Summer.  

Or, at least, that was what happened last year. This time around, Y/N was stuck in the workshop of the great Tony Stark, observing him work from the couch and couldn’t visit any spring garden to ponder on the beauty of the waking nature.

- Tonyyy – she whined, changing her position on the couch, now hanging upside down, with her legs in the air. - I am bored.

- What was is, honey? - the genius said, not looking up.  

Honestly, she really shouldn’t complain. Tony was working on some updates on the Spider-man suit and she knew it was necessary. Peter has been moaning about this and that for ages now, and Tony finally had a few spare moments in between meetings at the SI and fighting the mediocre villains. Plus, her older lover looked very hot like this, in glasses, wearing the black wife-beater and low hanging jeans, covered in grease, with the blue light constant on his chest…

- Y/N? - Tony asked, concerned. He was looking at her now, his brown eyes full of worry and confusion. She quickly snapped out of her (very pleasant) daydreams.  

- It’s nothing. - she assured him with a smile. Then she wrinkled her nose in a manner that Tony secretly thought to be unfairly adorable. - It’s just the first day of the spring, you know? I always…

- Is it? - he said distractedly, going back to his project. If he only could somehow synthesize…

- It is. - Y/N said louder, finally sliding off the couch slightly annoyed. She might normally understand that he would lose himself in the work, his brain never shutting up and constantly spinning ideas. But now… Now she felt slightly hurt that he so quickly lost interest in what she was going to say. - No matter, though. Keep working, hon, I’ll find someone else to share my memories with.

She turned on her heel and started walking towards the door. She lied, of course. The happy memories already fled her mind and right now she was going to the kitchen to find ice-cream and maybe some poor sod who would listen to her bitch about the 21st century men.

She felt a hand grab her arm and then she was spun around and caught between the wall and the warm body of her boyfriend. She felt breath catching in her throat and a hot blush crawled up her neck.

- Well, then. - The low, sultry voice reached her ears. The blush threatened to reach her face. - With whom would you share your memories, huh? - Callused hands gripped her waist. - Captain Rightouspants? - Hot breath on her neck. - Or maybe Barnes, huh?

Y/N bit back a moan and shook her head. A searing and passionate kiss swept aside all her thoughts, leaving only sensations of his hot mouth on hers, his hair under her palm and a tight grip on her middle.  

When he released her, she was slightly dizzy and breathless, but the soft look on his face was what made her heart truly ache.  

- Idiot – she whispered. She didn’t know if she was talking about him or herself.

- Let’s do it that way – he smiled into her hair. - I’ll finish this for Peter, while you take a shower and take your time picking a perfect spring dress. And then we’ll go to the park, have some ice-cream and you’ll tell me all about your perfect First Day of Spring, hmmm?

Y/N nodded her head and smiled up at her lover. He let his hands fall from her waist and moved away a little, planning on going back to the workstation. Y/N was the one to grab onto him this time. When he turned to her with surprise written all over his face, she smiled and said:

- I told you that before, didn’t I? I told you you’re my favourite. Now and always.  

- Now and always.

- I told you that before, didn’t I? I told you you’re my favourite. Now and always.  

- Now and always.

*endgame spoiler alerts everywhere here.*
